Name: Rest Day
Description: Recovery is important, if you dont take rest your muscles wont be able to properly grow stronger and doing anything strenous could damage your muscles making recovery time much longer, it is advised that you take it easy and relax, depending on how your muscles are you maybe be able to be generally active but it is not advised you do anything strenous and if you find your muscles hurting you should make sure to relax, perhaps use muscle relief medicnes. As well that you should reflect on your workouts and how you could improve them and whether you should do less or more or different exercises

Name: Full Body workout
Description: Self-improvement is a lifelong journey. Let's continuously achieve new heights, as we are our own competition.

Name: Refeed Quench
Description: Hard work throughout a week makes one deserving for a treat! Relax and indulge with an extra slice.
